Package com.tranquyet.util.excel

Class ListStudentTable

java.lang.Object
com.tranquyet.util.excel.table.ListStudentTable
public class ListStudentTable extends Object
ListStudentTable will create table, bind value to cell and draw main border which cover whole List Student Sheet at the List Student Sheet

  • Method Details

    • createPage

      public static void createPage​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet studentSheet, ComponentExcel componentExcel, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook wb, ExcelModel excelModel, int pageNumber, List<Student> list)
      active method:
                    createFieldAndTopBorder: generate the field for table and top main border
              createNameTableAndPage: generate the name of table, page number and the left and right of main border
              createCellAndBind: generate the cell of table and bind the value into them
      Parameters:
      studentSheet - create List Student Sheet
      componentExcel - getting instance to embed the style for cell and border
      wb - representation of an Excel workbook
      excelModel - embedding the name of table and current page and total page
      pageNumber - current page, if any time it increase, a new page create
      list - contain the student information, have no more than 20 student per/list

    • createFieldAndTopBorder

      public static void createFieldAndTopBorder​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet studentSheet, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook wb, int startRow, ComponentExcel componentExcel)
      generate the field for table and top main border 
           **************************
     *                        *
     *                        *
      Parameters:
      studentSheet - create List Student Sheet
      wb - representation of an Excel workbook
      startRow - Dynamic value which depend on pageNumber, any time page number increase will create a new page and the location of cell, main border, name of table will increase pageNumber time
      componentExcel - embedding the name of table and current page and total page

      public static void createNameTableAndPage​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet studentSheet, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook wb, int startRow, ComponentExcel componentExcel, ExcelModel excelModel)
